MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in  CW8 Postcode area of Weaverham, affecting properties in Sandy Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:51PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible,  we now expect the power to be restored by 1AM via generator. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:40PM on 15th February 2021
